des: "This super simple recipe takes less than five minutes to prepare. It's a delicious shortcut if you don't have the time to make red wine sangria. Enjoy any time of the year! Fruitier, spicy wines such as Tempranillo work best for this drink."
ins: Place 3 ice cubes in each cocktail glass. Divide red wine and ginger ale between the glasses. Squeeze juice from 1 lime wedge into each glass; add rind. Add second lime wedge. Stir and serve.
